channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Microplastics Are Here, There, Everywhere
item.description: By KIM BELLARD Vaccine experts are going rogue in response to RFK Jr’s attacks on vaccine safety. Health insurers promise – honest…this time – to make...

item.title: The good news (154 million deaths avoided) and bad news about childhood vaccines
item.description: A new study points out success stories — and potential obstacles — to bringing vaccines to the world's children.

item.title: RFK Jr.'s picks for CDC vaccine advisers meet this week amid controversy
item.description: For the first time since Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. replaced all the members of the vaccine committee, it is meeting in Atlanta.

item.title: What RFK Jr. Isn’t Talking About: How To Make Vaccines Safer
item.description: Vaccines are under fire from the top of the Trump administration. Federal programs to monitor them and make them safer have always been underfunded.

item.title: California’s Much-Touted IVF Law May Be Delayed Until 2026, Leaving Many in the Lurch
item.description: California lawmakers are poised to approve a six-month delay in implementing the state’s in vitro fertilization law, pushing its start to January 2026...

item.title: ‘We Need To Keep Fighting’: HIV Activists Organize To Save Lives as Trump Guts Funding
item.description: While Congress fails to stave off cuts to HIV care, community leaders in Mississippi and beyond race to limit the damage.

item.title: RFK Jr. and Dr. Oz say health insurers will cut red tape on 'prior authorizations'
item.description: In recent years, health insurers ramped up the practice of requiring doctors to get their approval before tests and procedures. On Monday, health lead...

item.title: NPR's 'Embedded': Why doctors think women can have safe abortions without their help
item.description: Doctors have become increasingly supportive of self-managed abortion with pills, an abortion method that's become more common since the Supreme Court ...

item.title: Listen to the Latest ‘KFF Health News Minute’
item.description: “Health Minute” brings original health care and health policy reporting from the KFF Health News newsroom to the airwaves each week.

item.title: 5 Takeaways From Health Insurers’ New Pledge To Improve Prior Authorization
